entity.name: iblockelement
entity.query: select id, iblock_id, iblock_section_id, code from b_iblock_element

entity.name: section
entity.query: select code as section_code from b_iblock_section where id='${iblockelement.iblock_section_id}'

entity.name: iblock
entity.query: select detail_page_url from b_iblock where id='${iblockelement.iblock_id}'
